00035  * $Log$

00038  *

00040  * Getting rid of two remaining BSD types in favor of stdint.
00041  * Replaced 'u_int' by 'unsinged int' and 'uptr_t' by 'uintptr_t'.
00042  *

00048 #include "nut_io.h"
00049 
00050 #include <sys/device.h>
00051 #include <sys/nutdebug.h>
00052 
00053 #include <fs/fs.h>
00054 #include <errno.h>
00055 
00060  
00073 int _seek(int fd, long offset, int origin)
00074 {
00075     NUTFILE *fp = (NUTFILE *) ((uintptr_t) fd);
00076     NUTDEVICE *dev;
00077     IOCTL_ARG3 conf;
00078 
00079     NUTASSERT(fp != NULL);
00080 
00081     conf.arg1 = (void*) fp;
00082     conf.arg2 = (void*) &offset;
00083     conf.arg3 = (void*) origin;
00084     
00085     dev = fp->nf_dev;
00086     if (dev != 0) {
00087         if ((*dev->dev_ioctl) (dev, FS_FILE_SEEK, &conf)) {
00088             return 0;
00089         } else {
00090             errno = EINVAL;
00091             return -1;
00092         }
00093     } else {
00094         errno = EINVAL;
00095         return -1;
00096     }
00097 }
